text:
1. Prepare for handstand by placing hands on the ground shoulder-width apart.
2. Kick both legs up into the air.
3. Balance on hands while walking on them.
4. Maintain a straight body position.
5. Move hands forward one at a time while walking on them.
6. Keep legs extended and toes pointed.
7. Continue walking on hands for desired distance or time.
8. Lower legs back down to the ground to finish.
